entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
